org.kedos.random

Class KRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kedos.random.KRandom

  • public class KRandom
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by shaked on 08/11/2015. Defines a static utils class to randomly generate common java types and data structures. USAGE: KRandom.nextIntArray(size) Will generate an array of size 'size' filled with random int numbers. KRandom.setUseSecure() Will set this @KRandom to use @SecureRandom. KRandom.setUseNotSecure() Will set this @KRandom to use @Random.

      • nextBooleanArray

        public static boolean[] nextBooleanArray(int size,
                         double onesProbability)
        Generates random boolean array with defined probability to get @true and @false.
        Parameters:
        size - requested array size.
        onesProbability - the probability to get 'true' or '1' in the returned array.
        Returns:
        boolean array of size @size with @onesProbability to get @true (or '1') and (1 - @onesProbability) to get @false (or '0').
